alert.note: Alert for Central Douglas County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 04 at 2:59PM PDT until November 05 at 11:00AM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PDT SATURDAY ABOVE 1500 FEET... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Above 1500 feet in elevation Douglas and eastern Coos County. * WHEN...Until 11 AM PDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
